fullDescription.intro: This node merges two arrays of data tables into one array.

option.name: Replace duplicate tables on inport one

fullDescription.option: If the arrays from both input ports contain tables with identical table names, this option defines the merging approach. Check this option to overwrite all duplicates with data from the second input port. Leave the option unchecked to avoid overwriting in the merging procedure.

ports.inPort: the first data table array to merge data with
the second data table array to merge data with
ports.outPort: the array resulting from the merging procedure
